content.description: Stand start on crimps under the small roof, crux establishing with small feet below you, and then make a reach up to the lip, match up, bring your feet up under you and then rock over right above the start holds to topout.
content.location: On the backside of the Tomato Slab, opposite Roadies in a Pocket. The shortest face on the boulder, easy to recognize by the very small roof at ~head height.

content.description: Stand start on the slab and climb straight up through a variety of pockets to topout on good holds at the lip.
content.location: Front of the slab, face of the boulder visible from the road.

content.description: Start way down in the hole right hand on arete and left hand a low crappy crimp; move up the arete into the right facing edge near the tree, from here fight a little bit of a barn door and make a reach out to a good edge high on the right arete. Avoid dabbing on the tree, match up on the arete and ride it back up and left to topout at the highest point on this face ~over the starting holds, topout there on goods holds.
content.location: On the left side of the Tomato Slab, if looking at the boulder from the road; left of Roadies in a Pocket.

content.description: Stand start on good holds at ~chest/head height, move up and right through good holds until you can make a reach up and left to goods holds at the lip, topout directly above the start holds.
content.location: On the shorter slab face of the boulder, to the right of Rhodies in a Pocket

content.description: This small boulder has a a few good vert/slab problems and is a great stop if you are looking to warm up for anything else in this area or if you were looking to get some volume done in the woods.
